events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit me properly. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been classified under refund requests based on customer's message about returning and getting money back.
The refund issue has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further handling and communication with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original condition for processing the refund?
My order number is 1234567890. The jacket is unworn and still has all the original tags attached.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label I am providing now.
Thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label. I will ship the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Closing this case now as refund has been successfully processed and no further issues were reported by the customer.
